verses.verse: And the men <S%H376><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and went <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Yiftach <S%H3316><s%>, Wherefore passedst thou over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, and didst not call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> us to go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with thee? we will burn <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thine house <S%H1004><s%> upon thee with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And Yiftach <S%H3316><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, I and my people <S%H5971><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8804><s%> at great <S%H3966><s%> strife <S%H376><s%> <S%H7379><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>; and when I called <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you, ye delivered <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me not out of their hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And when I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that ye delivered <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8688><s%> me not, I put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%> in my hands <S%H3709><s%>, and passed over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, and the YY <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them into my hand <S%H3027><s%>: wherefore then are ye come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me this day <S%H3117><s%>, to fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> against me?

Then Yiftach <S%H3316><s%> gathered together <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the men <S%H582><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, and fought <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with Efrayim <S%H669><s%>: and the men <S%H582><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, because they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Ye Gil`adis <S%H1568><s%> are fugitives <S%H6412><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the Efrayimites <S%H669><s%>, and among <S%H8432><s%> the Manassites <S%H4519><s%>.

And the Gil`adis <S%H1568><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the passages <S%H4569><s%> of Yarden <S%H3383><s%> before the Efrayimites <S%H669><s%>: and it was so, that when those Efrayimites <S%H669><s%> which were escaped <S%H6412><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let me go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; that the men <S%H582><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Art thou an Efrayimite <S%H673><s%>? If he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Nay;

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> they unto him, Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now Shibboleth <S%H7641><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Sibboleth <S%H5451><s%>: for he could not frame <S%H3559><s%> to pronounce <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> it right <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8686><s%>. Then they took <S%H270><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and slew <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him at the passages <S%H4569><s%> of Yarden <S%H3383><s%>: and there fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%> of the Efrayimites <S%H669><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

And Yiftach <S%H3316><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>. Then died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yiftach <S%H3316><s%> the Gil`adi <S%H1569><s%>, and was buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in one of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>.
And after <S%H310><s%> him Ibzan <S%H78><s%> of Beit-Lechem <S%H1035><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And he had thirty <S%H7970><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, and thirty <S%H7970><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%>, whom he sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> abroad <S%H2351><s%>, and took <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in thirty <S%H7970><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> from abroad <S%H2351><s%> for his sons <S%H1121><s%>. And he judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.
Then died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Ibzan <S%H78><s%>, and was buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8735><s%> at Beit-Lechem <S%H1035><s%>.

And after <S%H310><s%> him Elon <S%H356><s%>, a Zebulonite <S%H2075><s%>, judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; and he judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And Elon <S%H356><s%> the Zebulonite <S%H2075><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and was buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in Aijalon <S%H357><s%> in the country <S%H776><s%> of Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%>.
And after <S%H310><s%> him Abdon <S%H5658><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hillel <S%H1985><s%>, a Pirathonite <S%H6553><s%>, judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And he had forty <S%H705><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> nephews <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1121><s%>, that rode <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> ass colts <S%H5895><s%>: and he judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And Abdon <S%H5658><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hillel <S%H1985><s%> the Pirathonite <S%H6553><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and was buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in Pirathon <S%H6552><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, in the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%>.
